title: Champion quotes you would not want to hear your doctor say

replies.body: {{champion:222}} I'm trying to care, but... I just can't.

{{champion:89}} Oh, I think I broke a nail....
Good thing it wasn't mine

{{champion:103}} Should I make your pulse rise or stop?

{{champion:37}} ...

>{{champion:37}} ...

That's the best one out of these

{{champion:112}} "Steel can fix all your flaws."  *Laughter*
{{champion:14}} "Another corpse for the pile."
{{champion:15}} "It's not stealing if they're dead."
{{champion:45}} "Your soul will come to serve ME!"
{{champion:6}} "Death is the only escape."
{{champion:6}} "The gift of eternal pain."
{{champion:83}}.  Pretty much everything he says.
Really pretty much any of Sion's Quotes

{{champion:14}} 

"They'll never find all your pieces."

"I'll pull you apart!"

"Your puny body is the only joke here."
{{champion:82}} This whole...living thing, is highly overrated.

{{champion:222}} "Seriously, screaming helps... not at all."

{{champion:267}} "People and their air..."

{{champion:25}} "Share in my torment!" (or any Morg quote, for that matter..)
{{champion:222}}  "Gotta' die sometime!"

> [{quoted}](name=Machh,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RO3AKRER,comment-id=002c,timestamp=2015-06-24T22:48:40.349+0000)
>
> {{champion:245}} Let's be honest - I have no idea what I'm doing.

http://i.imgur.com/cHIbPsd.gif

{{champion:90}} I think a Voidling just came out.  (Me: Wait... WHAT????)

{{champion:5}} Here's a tip, and a spear behind it!  (Me: WHY????)

{{champion:9}} I haven't got a brain, and soon, neither will you.  (Me: Oh, god!!  SAVE ME!!!!!!)

{{champion:98}} You're already dead. You just haven't caught up yet.
{{champion:266}} They call my work a hack job!
{{champion:80}} They will not enjoy this.
{{champion:23}} *ults* FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

{{champion:45}} "What's black and blue and is about to show you the definition of pain?!"
I don't want to get a prostate exam from him.
{{champion:222}}  "Be right back! no one die screaming without me!"
{{champion:91}} ahh... I've lost another blade. I wonder who it's in this time
{{champion:43}} "I know your spirit, but I must stop your heart."

{{champion:43}} "...So that I can replace a valve to restore your proper blood flow before restarting your heart."

"Oh good. I was worried there for a second."
{{champion:36}} "Mundo"
{{champion:157}} It's just death, nothing serious.
{{champion:61}} Why do they keep breaking?

{{champion:236}} Everybody dies, some just need a little help.
{{champion:107}}  You have a warriors heart, I think I'll take it.
{{champion:421}} *Land-Shark-Dolphin Sound*
{{champion:58}} Light meat, dark meat, it's all the same!
{{champion:58}} Who's next on the chopping block?
{{champion:101}} Power laning, power farming, power ganking, power kills! So many kills, four hundred kills!
{{champion:101}} Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt!
Infernal {{champion:75}} By fire, be purged!
{{champion:157}} It's just death, nothing serious.
{{champion:119}} Not Draven, Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven.
{{champion:102}} Feel my talons.
{{champion:238}} What I have done... can not be undone..
{{champion:83}} Life slips away.
{{champion:120}} Suffering is magic.
{{champion:412}} Your falling apart.. What to do with the pieces?

{{champion:75}} "Life is part of a cycle. Yours is over."
{{champion:11}} "One cut, of many."
{{champion:55}}"Come on, live a little... while you can!"
{{champion:7}} "Lying is, like, ninety five percent of what I do."

{{champion:16}} "I will not save you."
{{champion:15}} "Life's cheap. Death pays."
{{champion:69}} "Poison takes so many forms."
{{champion:127}} "Another frozen corpse."
{{champion:28}} "Your pain is my pleasure."
{{champion:56}} Bring me more fleshbags to slice up. (talking to nurse)

Too many possibilities, dude. I just...I know I'm missing a million.

{{champion:107}} "So much bloodshed...This is my kind of place." - "You've earned a good death. I've earned the kill."

{{champion:61}} "They come apart so easily...How do you put them back together again?"

{{champion:72}} "FEEL MY STING"

{{champion:28}} "Mmm. I like it when they scream."

{{champion:30}} "Sorry, I'm booked through...Forever." - "Do you have a moment to talk about death?"

And seriously almost anything {{champion:16}}  says. Notably, "Yes, that was a banana. Hmhmhm. Nobody expects the banana."

{{champion:34}} "Find Peace"
{{champion:34}} "Life Passes so Swiftly"
{{champion:102}} "Suffer my Fury"
{{champion:40}} "Yes, it's true. For only $2.95 a minute, I will leave you breathless."
{{champion:60}} "It will all be over soon."
Anything {{champion:30}} says basically lol

Anything {{champion:150}} says because...you wouldn't want a doctor that can't even speak correctly lol
I'd be super happy if my doctor looked like Janna and said that.

{{champion:238}} The unseen blade is the deadliest
{{champion:266}} Nobody understands me! They called my work a hack job.
This is no mere massacre; this is my masterwork!
Pretty much anything {{champion:56}} , Eternum {{champion:56}} , Gatekeeper {{champion:3}} , and {{champion:19}} say.
{{champion:154}} This is gonna get messy.
{{champion:29}} It'll only hurt until you die
{{champion:104}} Dead man walking.
{{champion:26}} I've seen your death, it was painful...
{{champion:12}} you can't milk those

{{champion:81}} Sounds dangerous, I'm in!
{{champion:104}} Hope you weren't plannin' on dyin' of natural causes.
{{champion:33}}  Ok
{{champion:29}}  _This_ will do...
{{champion:58}} What? Do I have someone in my teeth?

{{champion:64}} Your will, my hands
{{champion:92}} My hands are stained
{{champion:72}} "My stinger is ready." ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:161}} "Are no organs safely removable???"
After reading this shit, I'm just thinking, "I want to become the world's best doctor, then say shit like this to scare the hell out of my patients!"
{{champion:63}} : This body is just one of many
{{champion:157}}  No cure for fools

{{champion:61}} "They break so easily... How do you put them back together again?"
{{champion:254}} "We can either do this the hard way or... Oh wait, no. There's just the hard way."
{{champion:222}} "I accidentally did that on purpose."

{{champion:127}} "The cold will numb your pain."
{{champion:117}} "Too tall. **Much** too tall."
Lol the Lulu one when your having the mindset of this thread reminds me of a guy from Percy Jackson that has the store where he sells beds.

{{champion:26}} Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like banana
{{champion:26}} I've seen your death, it was painful..."

{{champion:110}} Bloodshed carries a price
{{champion:110}} There is no salvation
Old{{champion:14}} Hand bone connected to the axe bone connected to your face bone!
{{champion:16}} I will not save you
{{champion:157}} There is only death... mine, or yours!
I thought Old {{champion:14}} 's joke was "Hand palm connected to the axe palm connected to your FACE palm!"

{{champion:30}}
Rest in piece.
Your time has come.
The rhythm of your life slows.
Die by my hand, and rise anew!
I crave the parting.
Sleep now, child.
You all die, why not choose how?
Death is but a horizon.
Die!
Persish!
Cease to be!
Let me show you an alternative to death.

{{champion:82}} 
This whole... living thing is... highly overrated.
Your sickness... sustains me.
Death would be too good for the likes of you!

{{champion:80}}
They are privileged to die at my feet!
{{champion:75}} The cycle of life and death continues.  We shall live.  They shall die.

> The cycle of Q and QQ continues. We shall Q. They shall QQ.

Ftfy
